mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.telephone AS "telephone", a.info_call AS "call", a.vehicle_type AS "vehicleType", a.vehicle_color AS "vehicleColor", a.vehicle_code AS "vehicleCode", a.is_limit_line AS "isLimitLine", a.remark AS "remark", a.nh_001 AS "nh001", a.nh_002 AS "nh002", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.price AS "price"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM vehicle a
WHERE a.id = #{id} and a.is_valid = 1

SELECT
FROM vehicle a
a.is_valid = 1
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.vehicle_Type LIKE '%'||#{vehicleType}||'%' '%'+#{vehicleType}+'%' concat('%',#{vehicleType},'%')
AND a.vehicle_Color LIKE '%'||#{vehicleColor}||'%' '%'+#{vehicleColor}+'%' concat('%',#{vehicleColor},'%')
AND a.vehicle_Code LIKE '%'||#{vehicleCode}||'%' '%'+#{vehicleCode}+'%' concat('%',#{vehicleCode},'%')
order by a.create_time desc
,${page.orderBy}

SELECT
FROM vehicle a
a.is_valid = 1
ORDER BY a.create_time desc
,${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vehicle( name, telephone, info_call, vehicle_type, vehicle_color, vehicle_code, is_limit_line, remark, nh_001, nh_002, create_time, price ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{telephone}, #{call}, #{vehicleType}, #{vehicleColor}, #{vehicleCode}, #{isLimitLine}, #{remark}, #{nh001}, #{nh002}, #{createTime}, #{price} )
mapper.update: UPDATE vehicle SET name = #{name}, telephone = #{telephone}, info_call = #{call}, vehicle_type = #{vehicleType}, vehicle_color = #{vehicleColor}, vehicle_code = #{vehicleCode}, is_limit_line = #{isLimitLine}, remark = #{remark}, nh_001 = #{nh001}, nh_002 = #{nh002}, create_time = #{createTime}, price = #{price} WHERE id = #{id}
